name: Honkai Impact 3rd: As Thunders Filled the Sky
storyline: Coral Island, the epitome of civilization situated on the equator, is falling apart in the surging tides of Honkai energy. Mei and Durandal step into the unpredictable battle together as the first collaboration between the now allied Schicksal and World Serpent...
summary:
Version 4.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Here Lies Bellflower arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Thunder (Raiden Mei)
• New ELF: Bella
• New Story Chapter XVIII: From Beds of Everlasting Snow
• New Featured Event: Gemina Invasions - Deep Paradise Arc
• ...and more!
